subject: Golf
Walker Cup (Golf)
organizations: National Golf Links of America (Southampton, NY)
lead_paragraph: Three University of Alabama golfers combined for 7 of the American team’s points in its 17-9 Walker Cup victory over the top amateurs from Britain and Ireland.
snippet: Three University of Alabama golfers combined for 7 of the American team’s points in its 17-9 Walker Cup victory over the top amateurs from Britain and Ireland.
